text:
@narendramodi @BillGates @gatesfoundation PM @narendramodi interacts with Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation co-chair, @BillGates via video conference. 

They discussed the global response to #COVID19, and the importance of global coordination on scientific innovation and R&D to combat the #pandemic. https://t.co/4N6pMFZyao
